snippet.title: Elderly man hit by car in Hervey Bay
snippet.content:
AN ELDERLY man who was hit by a car in Hervey Bay suffered fractures to his arms and legs.
The vehicle struck the 82-year-old was on the corner of Bideford and Exeter Sts about 6pm on Monday.
He was taken to Hervey Bay Hospital.
Traffic is back to normal at site of accident.
